title: The $q$-immanants and higher quantum Capelli identities
authors: Naihuan Jing, Ming Liu and Alexander Molev
abstract:
We construct central elements of the quantized enveloping algebra ${\rm
U}_q({\mathfrak{gl}}_n)$ parameterized by arbitrary Young diagrams, analogous
to Okounkov's quantum immanants. We show that the Harish-Chandra images of the
$q$-immanants coincide with the Schur polynomials. We also prove quantum
analogues of the higher Capelli identities and derive Newton-type identities.
